title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Skills: Science Reading Strategy Development Course Considering Multicultural Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading proficiency and comprehension of simple scientific terminology
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can extract key information from science reading materials reflecting diverse cultural perspectives

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
